subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After nearly 40 years of calling the shots, Joseph Mattioli, 86, has decided to retire as the head of Pocono Raceway.
snippet: After nearly 40 years of calling the shots, Joseph Mattioli, 86, has decided to retire as the head of Pocono Raceway.
